name: Romans took my house
description:
This game was made in 72 hours for the Mini Jam 51: Rome.

You are a roman general who sends waves of warriors to bring destruction to the world (Or just destroy a castle), but remember that the defensive towers will try to stop you.

Team Members:

Bunnyzitto: Artist, musicist and sfx designer;

Coelhonix: Scripting, Animating, Unity design;

Showva: Scripting, Unity design.

Game Instructions:

Mouse Only
The game only have one level;
Spend your money to hire troops and send a wave;
You gain money at each wave end (100 coins * wave number);
If you don't damage the castle in a wave, you lose one life;
You have a total of three lifes at the beggining;
Sometimes you have to lose a battle to win the war;
